price: 7. „Kodėl tu neatvedi angelų mums, jei esi tiesą sakantis?“
arabic: لَّوۡمَا تَأۡتِينَا بِٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: law mā tatīnā bil-malāikati in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
